notes: Fully stacks with other attack speed increasing, armor increasing and armor decreasing effects.
A unit can be affected by the positive and the negative aura at the same time.
The aura's buff and debuff linger for 0.5 seconds.
The status debuff icon on enemies only shows up when the affected unit has vision over the source. However, the armor reduction in the HUD is always visible.
Both the positive and the negative aura affect buildings.
abilities.description: Grants 25 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by 5.

description: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
tips: The Assault Aura is a great tool for pushing enemy towers, as it provides reliable attack speed and armor. In addition to that, it also reduces the nearby structure and enemies' armor which can help the nearby ally heroes take them down.
attrs: Bonus +5 Strength +5 Agility +5 Intelligence +10 Armor +30 Attack speed
info: For strength heroes, it grants 100 health, 0.5 health regen, 0.4% magic resistance, 10.8 armor, 35 attack speed, 0.25% movement speed, 60 mana, 0.25 mana regen, 0.35% spell damage and 5 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 100 health, 0.5 health regen, 0.4% magic resistance, 10.8 armor, 35 attack speed, 0.25% movement speed, 60 mana, 0.25 mana regen, 0.35% spell damage and 5 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 100 health, 0.5 health regen, 0.4% magic resistance, 10.8 armor, 35 attack speed, 0.25% movement speed, 60 mana, 0.25 mana regen, 0.35% spell damage and 5 attack damage.
Together with the aura, one Assault Cuirass grants a total of 15.8 armor and 60 attack speed to the owner.
